Record.ClassificationPath: Pathological Conditions, Signs and Symptoms/Pathologic Processes/Arrhythmias, Cardiac/Tachycardia/Tachycardia, Reciprocating/Tachycardia, Sinoatrial Nodal Reentry
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Arrhythmias, Cardiac/Tachycardia/Tachycardia, Reciprocating/Tachycardia, Sinoatrial Nodal Reentry
Record.Description: Abnormally rapid heartbeats caused by reentry circuit in or around the SINOATRIAL NODE. It is characterized by sudden onset and offset episodes of tachycardia with a HEART RATE of 100-150 beats per minute. The P wave is identical to the sinus P wave but with a longer PR interval.
